tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_audits (
    audit_id INT NOT NULL,
    audit_date DATE NOT NULL,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    audit_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    audit_score FLOAT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (audit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_details (
    inspection_id INT NOT NULL,
    inspection_date DATE NOT NULL,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    inspection_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    inspection_result TEXT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (inspection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_monitoring (
    monitoring_id INT NOT NULL,
    monitoring_date DATE NOT NULL,
    monitor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    issue_found TEXT NOT NULL,
    action_taken TEXT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (monitoring_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Audit (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
    audit_type VARCHAR(50),
    audit_result VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Inspection (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_type VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_result VARCHAR(50)
);
